p: A third issue identified through the literature is associated with dominant market logics and cognitive framing. This area is linked to the work of Hahn et al. ( 2014) and Sharma and Jaiswal ( 2018) on cognitive framing and Waddock ( 2019) on sensemaking and leadership. While organisations continue to operate under a conceptualisation of value primarily linked to financial returns the cognitive decision-making process of managers will continue to be shaped away from significant proactive climate action.
